key.name: require-ctrl
key.summary: Require Ctrl or Meta to group windows
key.description: When enabled, windows will only be grouped when Ctrl or Meta (Super) is held while dragging

key.name: start-with-groups
key.description: When enabled, each window automatically gets its own tab bar. When disabled, windows start ungrouped until manually grouped.

key.name: show-tabs-maximized
key.description: When enabled, tab bars will be visible for maximized windows even when out of focus. When disabled, maximized windows will only show tabs when focused.
